## IDraggable interface

Represents an object that can be dragged.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IDraggable extends IDragStrategy 
```
**Extends:** [IDragStrategy](./blockly.idragstrategy.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getRelativeToSurfaceXY()](./blockly.idraggable.getrelativetosurfacexy.md) | Returns the current location of the draggable in workspace coordinates. |
